    written to the buffer (because it is currently used by the GPU from previous frame)

task-W4BFjWbH.title: Add the ability to manage multiple projects
task-W4BFjWbH.description: Allow users to organize their work across multiple separate projects, each with their own features, bugs, and tasks.

promptHistory.content:
Created implementation plan v1 for multi-project support. The plan covers:

- **Phase 1**: Data model & storage refactoring (project-scoped data files)
- **Phase 2**: Server API changes (project CRUD + scoped routes)
- **Phase 3**: Client context refactoring (ProjectProvider + hooks)
- **Phase 4**: UI implementation (project selector, modals)
- **Phase 5**: Polish & migration (auto-migrate existing data)

Key technical decisions:
- Each project gets its own directory under `.tasklist/projects/{projectId}/`
- New `projects.json` for project metadata, `settings.json` for global preferences
- Context hierarchy: ToastProvider > ProjectProvider > TaskProvider
- Automatic migration of existing data to "Default" project on first load
